ygData.messageBody:
--- Gary Long <glong@...> wrote:
> So here's a question for you higher-level paladins
> (16th and over) - at what level does it become
> necessary to have a magic weapon, and can the
> situations that require a magic weapon be handled by
> our summoned mace?

I got my shiny brass shield at 16th, and my combine
longsword at 18th (I'm 19th in Unrest now); for two
main reasons. One, I have determined the mino axe
isn't really the weapon it's cracked up to be. Two, I
was tired of having to run from ghouls that were blue
to me simply because I couldn't hurt them.

Newly armed with my enchanted arsenal, I took my
wizard and myself to Unrest and have since comenced to
group with others to beat back the hordes of undead
that spawn from the depths of the evil that is the
Estate of Unrest. And I'll tell you, it's a lot of
fun to fight with every shot going off while around me
dual wielding warriors and rangers, and other
paladins, are hitting with their offhands, or kicking
or bashing, for INVULNERABLE results.

One more level and I get Double Attack.

As for the summone 1hb, if it's all you have, sure.
If you have kept 1hb capped (I haven't, it's around 25
or so). The weapon's also not a very effective one,
poor ratio as I recall.
